name: Hip Flexor Stretch
setup: Start in a kneeling lunge position
Back knee on ground, front foot flat on floor
steps: Engage core and keep torso upright
Feel stretch in front of back hip and thigh
Hold stretch position for prescribed time
cues: Keep torso upright, don't lean forward
Breathe deeply and relax into stretch
mistakes: Letting front knee drift past toes
safety: Use padding under knee if needed. Avoid if you have knee pain. Stop if you feel pinching in hip joint.

regressions: Hold onto wall or chair for balance
progressions: Raise back arm overhead for deeper stretch
Add side bend away from stretched hip
Elevate back knee on cushion for more intensity

prescriptionHints.notes: Essential for anyone who sits frequently. Hold steady tension, no bouncing.

joints.notes: Keep core engaged to avoid compensatory lower back arch. Use knee padding as needed.
